title: 14-Year-Old Dies From Accidental Shooting at Gun Range
content:
14-year-old Jaide Tosseth has been identified as victim of an accidental shooting at McLean Bottoms Shooting range Sunday. Police say the entire family was present at the gun range when the incident happened that morning. The shooting is still under investigation, and police do not know whether it was a self-inflicted or by a family member.
There are security cameras at the range and are currently being reviewed. It is unclear whether or not the cameras actually caught anything on tape. Law enforcement said the gun involved in the shooting was owned by the Tosseth family, and Jaide was in a 'safe-zone' when the shooting occurred.
